experience.description: An established joint venture between Daud Investments and the Oman Investment Authority, with the goal of bringing well known international brands to the GCC region and providing exceptional shopping and dining experiences. Our portfolio includes Middle East Retail Group and Gourmet Gulf, both being leading companies in their respective industries. Middle East Retail Groups focus is to develop partnerships with retail brands where there are significant growth opportunities, brands such as Hamleys, Nous Paris, Hadoro and Pylones. Operating as Gourmet Gulf we have a leading presence in the GCC with franchises such as Texas de Brazil, YO Sushi, California Pizza Kitchen, Hummingbird Bakery and Panda Express. Through Gourmet Gulf, we have also established our own brands available for delivery only such as Slider box, Hala Beirut and Health Junkie. We are committed to expanding our presence across the region and achieving brand recognition. We always strive for continuous improvement to ensure our goals are met. Our team is passionate and made up of amazing individuals, who are dedicated to supporting each other and working towards a common goal. As each individual grows, so does the whole organization.

recommendations.recommendation: â€œArmin: I am really proud of you and your ability to compete and take every thing very serious. With such spirit You have an excellent carrier pass . Your understanding as well to the EPM and how to position the cloud solutions really very impressive . All the best and happy to work with youâ€

â€œI have been lucky enough to work with Armin over the past 18 months and have only had excellent results in this partnership.

Armin is laser focused with an emphasis on results. He is customer orientated and takes time to understand the customers needs before providing a solution. This allows him to be  a true trusted advisor to the clients where he is working. 

As a partner he is also win-win focused which is refreshing. Once you have an agreement with Armin he sticks to it with rigor and creates an environment of trust. This means that in a Vendor/Partner type of relationship we do not have to worry about any games being played one against the other.

On a business development level Armin is a very creative person who can find opportunities where others see only obstacles. His proactivity is infectious and he can get people together from multiple companies and create a team who can make an impact in a chosen market place. 

In summary, I would not hesitate to trust my business with Armin. He gets results.â€

headline: Marketing Manager @ Qashio
summary: You may think marketing is just making videos, and you're right (just that, you're 10% right). Hi, Im Aish, and welcome to a quick write-up on what Marketing really is. Every brand has a product/service to offer, and marketers make sure that no matter what stage your customer is in (there are four main ones Awareness- Interest- Desire- Action), there is a way to rope them in closer towards a sale. We are sales enablement, we represent every initiative taken to make the brand really known for what it is. So, if your customers walk in fully aware of what it is that you do, you are welcome! With nearly 10 years of growing businesses in profit thanks to various digital marketing and traditional marketing strategies, I love everything about this function and my goal has always been to increase brand value through various marketing initiatives. Done it all, from - Running brand partnerships - Drafting compelling social media activity and engagement - Hosting and participating in events that increases brand awareness and product interest - Building creative copy across all channels- digital and physical - Ensuring websites are optimized for highest lead conversion - Using performance marketing to drive business growth For fun, I use a lot of my marketing skills to build a voice on Linkedin and Instagram. The personal play truly allows me to meet like-minded professionals and understand algorithms better. Hopefully by the end of this read, you figure out the other sides to marketing. If not, I invite you to a drop me a DM and ask me what I'm currently working on and you may just about get a better picture!
active_experience_description: As part of Qashioâ€™s fast-growing fintech team, I lead strategic marketing initiatives that connect product innovation with commercial growth. My role spans go-to-market planning, content, and sales enablement, all with a focus on delivering measurable impact across the funnel. recommendations.recommendation: â€œAishwarya was someone who was dedicates to acheiving any goal that she would take on, whether assigned or as a personal initiative. She was clever, witty and enthusiastic at all times. Definitely dependable.â€

â€œAfter three outstanding terms with us, I can confidently say that Aishwarya is an exceptional candidate with remarkable potential in the field of marketing. Her journey with us has been nothing short of impressive, showcasing her growth, professionalism, and natural aptitude for marketing.

Aishwarya exudes confidence and possesses an intuitive marketing sense that is rare to find. Her ability to analyze, strategize, and execute ideas effectively has set her apart as a standout performer. She approaches challenges with determination and creativity, delivering solutions that are both innovative and practical.

I would have no hesitation in hiring her as a marketing professional, as she embodies the qualities every organization seeks, dedication, insight, and a results-driven approach. Any company would be fortunate to have her on their team, and I am certain she will add immense value to any organization she joins.â€
